attributes.action: Make Tax Credits Overpayment more fair...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most people with Tax Credit Debts may not know that if you have split up from your partner, and you are approached to pay an overpayment, if you set up a system to pay you may have to pay 100% back and your ex may never have to pay a penny back... Lets make it fair that you should only have to pay 50% and make absent partners pay their share!
